overview: Equal parts kitsch & nostaglia, this two-part seasonal spectacular is one one-of-a-kindâ€”haunting, hysterical, and heart-warming all at the same time!!  More in-SANTA-ty as HOWDY DOODY and BUFFALO BOB head for the North Pole! Plus JACK BENNY, THE BEVERLY HILLBILLIES, THE CHIPMUNKS, LOIUS ARMSTRONG, DANNY KAYE, BING CROSBY & DAVID BOWIE, JOAN RIVERS, GEORGE CARLIN, and a return visit from LIBERACE!
title: Christmas in Acidland Part 2
